Uses of Package
com.linecorp.armeria.server

  • Packages that use com.linecorp.armeria.server 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.server
    Server core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition
    Service composition.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.docs
    Documentation service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http
    HTTP service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.file
    HTTP static file service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.healthcheck
    Health check service for load balancers.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.jetty
    Embedded Jetty service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat
    Embedded Tomcat service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging
    Logging and metric-collecting decorator services.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift
    Thrift service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.tracing
    Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria services using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
  • Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.server used by com.linecorp.armeria.server 
    Class and Description
    PathMapped
    A value mapped by PathMappings.
    PathMapping
    Matches the absolute path part of a URI and translates the matched path to another path string.
    PathMappings
    Maps a request path to a value associated with a matching PathMapping.
    RequestTimeoutException
    A TimeoutException raised when a request has not been received from a client within timeout.
    ResourceNotFoundException
    A RuntimeException raised when a Service failed to find a resource.
    Server
    Listens to ServerPorts and delegates client requests to Services.
    ServerBuilder
    Builds a new Server and its ServerConfig.
    ServerConfig
    Server configuration.
    ServerListener
    Listens to life cycle events of a Server.
    ServerPort
    A pair of server-side bind address and SessionProtocol.
    Service
    Handles a request received by a Server.
    ServiceConfig
    A Service and its PathMapping and VirtualHost.
    ServiceRequestContext
    Provides information about an invocation and related utilities.
    ServiceUnavailableException
    A RuntimeException that is raised when a requested invocation cannot be served.
    VirtualHost
    A name-based virtual host.
    VirtualHostBuilder
    Builds a new VirtualHost.
